resps: Developed and integrated dynamic features such as Hot Collections, New Items, Top Sellers, Author Page, and Item Details, significantly enhancing the platform's user interface and interaction.
Designed and implemented engaging animations, countdowns, and carousels that increased user engagement and retention.
Utilized APIs to fetch and display real-time data, ensuring the latest and most relevant information was always available to users.
Managed the project lifecycle using GitHub, creating and maintaining separate branches for each feature to streamline development and facilitate effective team collaboration.
Conducted thorough code reviews and debugging sessions to ensure the highest quality of code and functionality.
Collaborated with the design team to translate UI/UX designs into functional features, ensuring a seamless user experience.
Achieved extensive hands-on experience with professional GitHub workflows, enhancing version control and team collaboration.
Contributed to improving the platform's performance and scalability by optimizing code and implementing best practices.
Engaged in continuous learning and application of new technologies and frameworks to stay current in the rapidly evolving tech landscape.
Demonstrated strong problem-solving skills by addressing complex technical challenges and providing effective solutions.
Gained valuable experience in remote team collaboration, utilizing tools like Slack, Trello, and Zoom to maintain clear and efficient communication.
Founded and led an e-commerce business, developing a transdermal vitamin patch to prevent hangovers.
Oversaw product development and websit maintence using HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, and Mailchimp for marketing automation.
Architected a robust front-end framework to deliver a seamless user experience, integrating advanced animation, countdowns, and carousels to boost user interaction and engagement.
Leveraged Firebase for backend services, including user authentication and real-time database management, ensuring secure and efficient data handling.
Implemented SEO best practices, resulting in improved search engine rankings and increased organic traffic.
Managed marketing campaigns through Mailchimp, effectively reaching and engaging with a broad customer base.
Analyzed user behavior and feedback to continuously improve the website's functionality and user experience.
Successfully scaled the business, achieving significant growth and culminating in a profitable exit, demonstrating strong business acumen and strategic planning.
Managed all social media platforms, generating over 500,000 followers and leading strategic marketing efforts.
Achieved the position of the number one seller on Amazon for this product category.
Coded separate landing pages and websites for A/B testing, enhancing user engagement and conversion rates.
